title: Google partners with Asus IoT to spread availability of Coral on-device AI hardware
content:
Coral is Google’s platform for adding on-device AI and inferencing capabilities to hardware. To make it more widely available, especially for Internet of Things use cases, Google is partnering with Asus IoT.

more…

The post Google partners with Asus IoT to spread availability of Coral on-device AI hardware appeared first on 9to5Google.
